Permits | City of Meadows Place

Featured

Permits
=======

* [Budget & Tax Rate](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/city-budget/)
* [Debt Transparency](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/debt-transparency/)
* [Property Tax Information](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/tax-information/)
* [Unclaimed Property](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/unclaimed-property/)
* [Residential Utility Rates](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/revised-10-1-16-res-utility-rate-schedule/)
* [Zoning Map](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/20190319-Meadows-Place-Zoning-Map.jpg)
* [Process for Requesting Public Information](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/process-for-requesting-public-information/)


* [Budget & Tax Rate](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/city-budget/)
* [Debt Transparency](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/debt-transparency/)
* [Property Tax Information](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/tax-information/)
* [Unclaimed Property](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/unclaimed-property/)
* [Residential Utility Rates](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/revised-10-1-16-res-utility-rate-schedule/)
* [Zoning Map](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/20190319-Meadows-Place-Zoning-Map.jpg)
* [Process for Requesting Public Information](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/government/public-information/process-for-requesting-public-information/)

**Permit Office Hours: Monday – Friday 8:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m.**  
One Troyan Drive, Meadows Place, Texas  77477  
Office Number: 281-983-2932  
Fax Number 281-983-2940  
Email: [permits@cityofmeadowsplace.org](mailto:permits@cityofmeadowsplace.org)  
**INSPECTIONS** **must be requested one day in advance by phone or email listed above.**

**Our Vision:** To protect the safety and well-being of our residents and the environment of our City through a professional permit process ensuring Meadows Place will continue to be …. *Your* Place for *Life*

**Our Goal:** To provide quick, courteous and professional service while enforcing all applicable ordinances, statues and regulations.

**Schedule of Fees:  [Click here](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Meadows-Place-Fee-Schedule-Ordinance-No.-2025-40-12.18.2025.pdf)** to see the current **Schedule of Fees**.

###### [*Permit Submittal – with a created Account –* ***Click Here***](https://account.municipalonlinepayments.com/Account/Login?ReturnUrl=%2Fconnect%2Fauthorize%2Fcallback%3Fclient_id%3Dwww.municipalonlinepayments.com%26redirect_uri%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fwww.municipalonlinepayments.com%252Fsignin-oidc%26response_type%3Dcode%2520id_token%2520token%26scope%3Dopenid%2520profile%2520email%26state%3DOpenIdConnect.AuthenticationProperties%253DrgSvCER2XoXnNytr2mV0Gk-IV4JQmYNEBBK68oMpP2d_Ed40DZOdWE06DEMUQ2iGNe0nQGHhQLlYhvd0L_6KWlvRaTpw2sxdz0IUzx8lwms9hMcHz5fNxBfjHgqQqQQCOeXa8rKAp9GbaNks7SMex9K5aa5C9kJ_qPWKqVwGEs4-KXBiR77-meY8qfkcKZ4SWV2BB9FV5EiOdsJHpHwI-qhnBI2qsImDTGkJ5uWf23299j-KYg2kW87SZEi4B6_QPFyWhW9h-SnkHSXvaED9VUu_vSJNt_AHEfIdHxkUFGoCUJ_zi4_fSZocE6BjNWB47K3zmHpUnNT65H8r6IRegJRdC0A%26response_mode%3Dform_post%26nonce%3D637837515800729697.OTM0NzFiMGEtNjVjZi00MTFlLTlhYWYtMjczYTlhOWQwMjBmMDViNDhhNzctMTZjZC00ZGVkLWEzMTYtYjA0OTA0NjM2MTk2%26site%3Dmeadowsplacetx%26x-client-SKU%3DID_NET461%26x-client-ver%3D5.5.0.0)

*[PERMIT PAYMENT with Permit Number and Amount to Pay – Click Here](https://www.municipalonlinepayments.com/meadowsplacetx/easypay/oXY2TTFrwUm7C6-XrLR2RQ/permit-payment-with-a-permit-number)*

**All contractors working in the City must obtain a [Contractor Registration](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Contractor-Registration-Form-2.pdf) and permit (home owners included) before starting any work.**  All Contractors must provide a master license in their trade and proof of liability insurance (faxed or emailed directly to the city from the insurance company).

**Below is a list of work that requires a Permit.  Although all work requiring a permit may not be listed, it is best to contact the City before starting any work at your home or business to see if a permit is necessary.**

**[Building Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Building-Permit-Application-1.pdf)**: This application is required for the following type of work:  New Construction, Additions, Remodels, Build Outs, Foundation Work, Cement Work, Patio Covers, Swimming Pool, Fences, and Window Replacement, and possibly other services not listed.

**[Electrical Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Electrical-Permit-Applicatio-and-TCI-Letter-Revised-06.2018.pdf)**:  This application is required for the following type of electrical work:  Electrical Services, Meter Loop & Service, Sub-panels, Installation of new lighting fixtures, outlets, appliances, Generators, Re-connection of Service, and possibly other services not listed.

**[Plumbing/Gas Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Plumbing-Gas-Permit-Application-2023.pdf)**:  This application is required for the following type of work:  Water & Sewer, Backflow preventer, Water Lines, Sewer Lines, Storm Sewer, Installation of New Fixtures like,  Yard drains, Pool Heaters, Water Softener, Ice Maker, Gas Pressure Test, Gas Line Re-connection, and possibly other work not listed.

**[Mechanical Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Mechanical-Permit-Application-Revised-06-20-2018.pdf)**: This application is required for the following type of work:  Installation of Air Conditioners or Heaters, Toilet Exhaust, Exhaust hoods and possible other work not listed.

[**Roof Permit**](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Roofing-Permit-Application-Revised-10-2021.pdf):  This application is required when installing a new roof.

**[Irrigation Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Irrigation-Permit-Revised-05.04.2017-1.pdf)**:  This application is required for the installation of new irrigation systems and possibly repair work to existing irrigation systems.

[**Driveway and Sidewalk Permit**](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Driveway-Sidewalk-Permit-Application-Revised-01-2020.pdf):  This is application is required for driveway and sidewalk installation and/or repairs.

**Additional Permit Applications Listed Below**

[Annual Fire Prevention Operations Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Annual-Fire-Permit-11-2016-5.pdf)

[Fire Sprinkler-Alarm Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Fire-Sprinkler-Alarm-Permit-Application-11-2016-1.pdf)

[Banner](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2012-banner-permit-app.pdf)

[Beer & Wine License](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Alcoholic-Beverage-License-Application.pdf)

[Burglar Alarm](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Alarm-Permit-Renewal-Application-2023.pdf)

[Business Name Change/Change of Owner](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Business-Name-Change-Change-of-Ownership-Application-Revised-April-2019.pdf)

[Demolition](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2012-demolition-permit-app.pdf)

[Easement and Right-of-Way](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Easement-and-Right-Of-Way-Permit-Application-Fillable-Form-1.pdf)

[Estate Sale Permit](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Estate-Sale-Permit-Application-09.28.2022.pdf)

[Rental/Occupancy Form](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Occupancy-Rental-Inspection-Form-Revised-10-09-2020.pdf)

[Rental Property License](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Residential-Rental-Property-License-Application2023-1.pdf)

[Short Term Rental License](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Short-Term-Rental-Property-License-Application2025.pdf)

[Signs](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2012-sign-permit-app.pdf)

A [Credit Card Authorization](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Credit-Card-Authorization-Permits-2023.pdf) form may also be completed and submitted with all permit applications to expedite your permit.

**Plan Review:** New home building and home remodeling requires detailed plans. The following information needs to be submitted in order to obtain a permit. Submitted documents should be complete to expedite plan review and permit issuance.

**Applicant needs to submit the following:**

1. Permit Application
2. 3-Plot Plans to include Legal Description (Lot, Block, Subdivision and lot dimensions)
3. 3-Energy Reports
4. 3-Stamped Engineering foundation letters
5. 3-Sets of Construction Plans

[**Submittal Requirements**](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Permit-Submittal-Requirements.pdf)

**Inspections:**Your inspection request must be scheduled the day before with the Permit Clerk via [email](mailto:permits@cityofmeadowsplace.org) or phone at, 281-983-2932, before the inspector is notified.

BBG Consulting –Building Official

---

**Current Codes:** Below you will find links to the current building codes the City of Meadows Place abides by. Click on each code for additional information.

### [Click Here for Meadows Place Code of Ordinances](https://library.municode.com/tx/meadows_place/codes/code_of_ordinances)

| Code Description | Ordinance |
| --- | --- |
| [2015 International Building Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IBC2015) | [Ordinance No. 2018-24](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-24-Approved-Adopting-2015-International-Building-Code.pdf) |
| [2015 International Plumbing Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IPC2015) | [Ordinance No. 2018-28](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-28-Approved-Adopting-2015-International-Plumbing-Code.pdf) |
| [2015 International Fuel Gas Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IFGC2015) | [Ordinance No. 2018-26](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-26-Approved-Adopting-2015-International-Fuel-Gas-Code.pdf) |
| 2015 International Mechanical Code | [Ordinance No. 2018-27](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-27-Approved-Adopting-2015-International-Mechanical-Code.pdf) |
| [2015 Texas Food Establishments Rules (TFER)](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/2015-Texas-Food-Establishment-Requirements-TFER.pdf) | [Ordinance No. 2018-29](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-29-Approved-Adopting-2015-Texas-Food-Establishment-Rules-TFER.pdf) |
| 2014 National Electrical Code | [Ordinance No. 2017-05](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2017-05-Approved-Adopting-2014-National-Electric-Code.pdf) |
| [2015 International Residential Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IRC2015) | [Ordinance No. 2016-13](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2016-13-Adopt-2015-IRC-International-Residential-Code-Previous-2006.pdf) |
| [2012 International Energy Conservation Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IECC2012?examId=) | [Ordinance No. 2013-20](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-2013-20-Energy-Conservation-Code-2012.pdf) |
| [2012 International Property Maintenance Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IPMC2012?examId=) | [Ordinance No. 2014-02](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-2014-02-Amending-2012-International-Property-Maintenance-Code-Driveways.pdf) |
| [2012 International Swimming Pool & Spa Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/ISPSC2012?examId=) | [Ordinance No. 2013-21](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-2013-21-Swimming-Pool-Code-2012.pdf) |
| [2015 International Fire Code](https://codes.iccsafe.org/content/IFC2015?examId=) | [Ordinance No. 2018-25](https://cityofmeadowsplace.org/wp-content/uploads/Ordinance-No.-2018-25-Approved-Adopting-2015-International-Fire-Code.pdf) |
